oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - 1951-01-26 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), Jerry Rivers (performer) and Audrey Williams (performer), on January 26, 1951 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Audrey Williams; Jerry Rivers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams talks and introduces first tune -- Pins And Needles (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams talks and advertises Mother's Best -- Hank Williams introduces Audrey Williams -- Four Flusher (Audrey Williams) -- Louis Buck and Hank Williams talk -- Hank Williams introduces the next tune -- I Heard My Mother Praying For Me (Hank Williams and Audrey Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams) -- Closing theme -- [break] -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams introduces the first tune -- Cool Water (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams introduces the next tune -- Orange Blossom Special (Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces next tune -- Lonely Tombs (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement (Louis Buck and Hank Williams) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Audrey, 1923-1975; Rivers, Jerry, 1928-;
